OUTLINE : Patients require fast minimum 6 hour prior positron emission tomography ( PET ) imaging . Fludeoxyglucose F 18 ( FDG ) administer IV 15 minute follow 50-60 minute later whole body PET imaging . Iodinated contrast dye administer IV injection mouth follow CT image chest , abdomen , pelvis within 2 week PET image . Whole body FDG PET image CT image chest , abdomen , pelvis repeat 6 month . Initial positive PET CT image result verify base surgical and/or biopsy finding clinical follow-up . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 patient accrue study within 2.5 year .
